## Setup

```{r setup, include=FALSE, warnings = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Attach packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

## Read in the data

```{r}
urchins <- read_csv(here("data", "urchins.csv"))

## Clean names

urchins_clean <- urchins %>% 
  clean_names()
```

## Visualize the data

```{r}
ggplot(data = urchins_clean, aes(x = size)) + # Create ggplot
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~ common_name) # Facet wrap by common name to sort by Purple and Red Urchins
```
